attributes.action: Have a national day of recognition for our amazing hardworking NHS.
attributes.additional_details: On March 26th 2020 the UK held a clap for the NHS at 8pm, the amount of support shown for our NHS across the country really shows just how much us the public appreciate everything they do for us day in day out. Why not show our health care that support every year?
attributes.background: Hold a national day of recognition for our National Health Service to show our continued support and appreciation for their amazing work.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
